msbt.message: Hey!<20_2 arg="3" /> Want to hear some "advice" on how to be more popular?
Huh?<20_2 arg="4" /> No. What?
I've been reading magazines I found in a box. They're from decades ago, when folks liked pastel pants.And I found ALL KINDS of tips on how to be popular. And they are all THE WORST!
Alright, hit me!

'K, there was one I read that said batting your eyelashes a lot is way in style and will make you tr√®s popular. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" /><20_2 arg="8" />Have you ever heard anything so goofy, ?
That's pretty silly.
I've heard worse.
Bat your eyelashes to be popular? Am I sending secret messages in Morse code?H-E-L-L-O-I-M-R-A-D-L-O-V-E-M-E.
I've got a message for whoever wrote that article, but it's not polite to say out loud.Good thing I know Morse code!
Yeah. I hear dumb stuff all the time.
<20_2 arg="3" />Right?! It's totally crazy how some things become trendy.
I saw one tip that said to agree with everyone. Constantly. Even if you actually don't. Like, what?!<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="8" />What do you think, ?
What do YOU think?
Forget that noise.
<20_2 arg="4" />I've got opinions. And if some punk's spouting off? Forget being popular! I'm going to say what I think!
<20_2 arg="3" />Heck yeah, ! I'm not saying I believe something I don't just to be popular.I'm popular enough already!
<20_2 arg="4" />Yeah! If you and someone who's got a different opinion don't get along, lying about how you feel won't help.
<20_2 arg="3" />Right! Looks like the only unpopular one around here is the goof that wrote the article.That's my opinion and I'm sticking to it!
! You smell suuuuper cute!
I don't<20_2 arg="4" /> wear perfume or anything and what the heck does "cute" smell like, anyways?
<20_3 arg="6" />Can you smell it, ? <20_3 arg="3" /><20_2 arg="8" />There's totes a cute smell just wafting off !
Smells like flowers!
Like soap, right?
Maybe like sweets?
Huh? Flowers? Dunno what you're talking about
<20_2 arg="3" />Ohmigosh!<20_2 arg="5" /> It is WAY adorbs that you love flowers so much you want to smell like them!<20_2 arg="4" />
Every dang perfume smells like flowers! <20_2 arg="7" />You can't NOT smell like flowers, !
<20_2 arg="3" />Nah, you don't have to get flowery stuff. That's why I usually smell like glitter glue!
Ohh!<20_2 arg="2" /> Yeah, I JUST took a bath, so you're probably smelling that!
You took a bath just now? <20_3 arg="4" /><20_2 arg="3" />So you bathe, what, three times a day?

<20_2 arg="4" />It's just a coincidence! I don't bathe three times a day!Wait. Lemme think about it yesterday morning Oh! And then after breakfastagain before lunchYA KNOW WHAT?! I'll take as many baths as I dang well want to!
Hey, if it keeps you smelling good, nobody's going to complain.
I just ate some . Maybe that's what you're smelling?
Where'd<20_2 arg="3" /> you get that? HANG ON! Did you make it yourself?!You? In the kitchen? That's ahh-dorbs!
<20_2 arg="4" />My parents sent it. And so what if I DID make it? <20_2 arg="0" />Everybody oughta know their way around a kitchen!
I don't have any of that tasty dessert in my kitchen, so I'll swing by later for some of yours, 'K?
<20_2 arg="3" />I totally stayed up all night playing video games, but I am STILL so very wide awake, !
Whoa.<20_2 arg="4" /> Hey, . You musta drank a buncha coffee to be so wired after so little sleep. That "" you just said must be driven by caffeine too!

<20_2 arg="3" />I got the island high score on a game that nobody else is skilled enough to play! So, yeah. I am EXCITED. But those seven cups of coffee I drank MIIIIIIIGHT be helping my catchphrase to be TOTES on point? You want to use<20_2 arg="4" /> it too, ? Juuuuust SING IT!
That's a great idea! I'm gonna use that rock-star phrase of yours, !
It totally has a different vibe when you use it! It's AMAZING!Whew That, um, that coffee it might not really be working anymorrr
